tasks.task: Operate a tractor to plant crops
subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat
Use the steering wheel to guide the tractor
Operate the seed drill attachment to plant seeds
Monitor the planting depth and spacing

tasks.task: Prepare a small area near a building for planting
subtasks: Clear the area of debris and rocks
Loosen the soil with a tiller or plow
Level the ground with a rake or similar tool

tasks.task: Sow seeds by hand in a small garden plot
subtasks: Select the appropriate seeds for planting
Open seed packets and separate seeds
Measure and mark rows for planting
Use a trowel or hoe to create planting holes or furrows
Handle the seeds gently to avoid damaging them
Distribute the seeds at the correct depth and spacing
Cover the seeds with soil and pat them down gently

tasks.task: Transport stored bales of hay to a barn
subtasks: Load the hay bales onto a trailer or truck
Secure the hay bales on the vehicle
Drive the vehicle to the barn
Unload the hay bales from the vehicle and distribute them in the barn

tasks.task: Perform maintenance on a piece of farm equipment
subtasks: Inspect the equipment for wear or damage
Clean the equipment to remove dirt and debris
Lubricate moving parts as needed
Check and tighten loose bolts or screws
Replace any worn or missing parts

tasks.task: Install a feed hopper for livestock
subtasks: Measure and mark the location for installation
Dig a hole or prepare a mount for the hopper
Assemble the hopper according to instructions
Attach the hopper to the mounting location
Connect the hopper to the feed system

tasks.task: Mix feed ingredients for livestock
subtasks: Weigh out the necessary amounts of different feed components
Combine the ingredients in a mixing bin or tub
Stir or blend the feed mixture thoroughly

tasks.task: Fertilize a field by spreading fertilizer
subtasks: Attach a spreader to a tractor
Follow the curves of the field to apply fertilizer uniformly
Measure the spread rate to ensure correct application

tasks.task: Cut hay in a field using a mower
subtasks: Operate the mower to cut the hay at the right height
Guide the mower around obstacles and between rows
Allow the hay to dry on the field

tasks.task: Gather cut hay using a raking machine
subtasks: Position the raking machine behind the mower
Control the distance between the rake and the mower
Operate the rake to form hay windrows
Guide the machine to avoid flattening or overlapping windrows

tasks.task: Load hay onto a wagon or vehicle for transport
subtasks: Use the grabbles on a hay loader to stack the hay
Secure the load to prevent shifting during transport
Drive the vehicle to the destination and unload the hay

tasks.task: Install a irrigation system in a field
subtasks: Dig trenches for the irrigation pipes
Bury the pipes at the correct depth
Install perforated pipes or emitters
Connect the pipes to the water source
Backfill the trenches and smooth the area

tasks.task: Inspect a barn for its condition
subtasks: Walk the perimeter of the barn to check for structural issues
Examine doors, windows, and roofing for damage or wear
Check the sturdiness of supports and beams
Look for signs of pests or moisture damage

tasks.task: Assist in the milking of dairy cows
subtasks: Clean the teats of the cow before milking
Apply teat dip after milking
Position the milking equipment on the cow
Start and control the milking process
Monitor the cow's comfort and behavior during milking

tasks.task: Check the water level in a livestock trough
subtasks: Approach the trough and lift the lid or remove the盖子
Look inside to visually assess the water level
Check the temperature of the water if necessary
Ensure the water is accessible for the animals

tasks.task: Apply a bridle to a horse
subtasks: Gather the bridle and lead rope
Approach the horse calmly and quietly
Insert the bit into the horse's mouth
Fasten the reins to the bridle
Secure the browband behind the horse's ears

tasks.task: Mow a grassland with a riding mower
subtasks: Attach mowing blades or a cutterbar to the mower
Ride the mower around the perimeter of the area to be mowed
Maneuver the mower to cut the grass evenly
Adjust the cutting height as necessary
Clear any debris from the mower deck

tasks.task: Plasma Cut a piece of metal
subtasks: Set up the plasma cutter and ensure proper connections
Position the metal piece in the desired cut path
Start the plasma cutter and initiate the cut
Monitor the cutting progress and adjust if necessary

tasks.task: Operate a mechanical arm for precision cutting
subtasks: Program the arm to follow a specific cutting path
Verify the accuracy of the cut against a template or measurement
Execute the cut, cleaning any excess material

tasks.task: Prepare industrial fresh water for hydroponic usage
subtasks: Fill a water reservoir or tank
Check the water's pH level and adjust if necessary
Filter the water to remove impurities
Add nutrients and minerals as per the hydroponic system's requirements

tasks.task: Operate a handheld spray bottle to apply pesticide
subtasks: Select the appropriate pesticide and fill the spray bottle
Attach the nozzle to the spray bottle
Apply the pesticide evenly over the crop area following the product instructions

tasks.task: Propagate plants through layering
subtasks: Select a suitable shoot or branch from a parent plant
Bury the lower part of the shoot in the soil
Maintain moisture around the buried portion
Wait for roots to develop before severing the layer from the parent plant

tasks.task: Gather fallen apples from a tree
subtasks: Approach the apple tree and shake the branches lightly
Collect the apples that have fallen to the ground
Sort the apples, separating those suitable for eating from those damaged or diseased
